thread.title: Luna & Larry's Coconut Bliss® Presents A Night of Bliss 2015
thread.title_full: Luna & Larry's Coconut Bliss® Presents A Night of Bliss 2015

author: Elizabeth Reilly
title: Luna & Larry's Coconut Bliss® Presents A Night of Bliss 2015
text:
Luna & Larry's Coconut Bliss will host their sixth annual community benefit and celebration, A Night of Bliss , on Saturday, November 7, 2015. This is the third year that the event will take place at the Unitarian Universalist Church of Eugene (UUCE), located at 1685 West 13th Avenue Eugene, Oregon, from 5:00-9:00 p.m. The affair features live music and endless Coconut Bliss sundaes, and is open to the public with a suggested donation of $10-$25 per person or $25-$50 per family. All proceeds go to support the work of two local non-profit organizations: Beyond Toxics and Glorybee’s Save the Bee . Last year the event raised over $8900 for two selected beneficiaries.
Highlights of the evening include a raffle and silent auction with goods and services provided by many local artisans and businesses. Small bites and other vegan appetizers prepared by a local chef will also be offered. Activities for children include face painting with all-natural dyes, an activity room sponsored by Rainbow Garden School, and more. All are welcome to come enjoy this blissful community event of giving.
